params.name: describedBy
params.description: Text or element id to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute to provide description for screenreader users.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the textarea, which is submitted with the form data.

params.name: rows
params.description: Optional number of textarea rows (default is 5 rows).

params.name: value
params.description: Optional initial value of the textarea.

params.name: label
params.description: Arguments for the label component. See label component.

params.name: hint
params.description: Arguments for the hint component (e.g. text). See hint component.

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: Arguments for the error message component (e.g. text). See error message component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Optional additional classes to add to the textarea tag. Separate each class with a space.

params.name: attributes
params.description: Any extra HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the textarea tag.

params.name: maxlength
params.description: If maxwords is set, this is not required. The maximum number of characters. If maxwords is provided, the maxlength argument will be ignored.

params.name: maxwords
params.description: If maxlength is set, this is not required. The maximum number of words. If maxwords is provided, the maxlength argument will be ignored.

params.name: threshold
params.description: The percentage value of the limit at which point the count message is displayed. If this attribute is set, the count message will be hidden by default.

params.name: countMessage.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the count message.
